task.title: Search for duplicate articles
task.shortdesc: Before creating a new Knowledge Base article, you need to verify the article is not already covered in the Knowledge Base.

step.cmd: Sign in to TDX and select Client Portal.
Once signed into TDX, click the Applications menuand select Client Portal.
Click Knowledge Base in the menu bar.
Click Search in the menu bar.

info.i: The Search page will appear with multiple search options.

step.info: By default, the Status filter is set to Approved.
Visit Knowledge Base search options reference file for more.

info.i: A list of articles that meet your search criteria will appear below the Search options.

step.cmd: Click the link to any article that could cover what your new article would cover.
Review the article to verify it does not cover what your new article would cover.
Repeat the search as necessary to ensure your new article is not already covered in the Knowledge Base.
step.info: You may need to try several searches with different keywords and search options.
